name: CardSlinger (Jellonator)
description:
In a world where all actions are determined by cards you are THE CARDSLINGER! Gather up cards to build killer decks and face deadly foes.

Cardslinger is a TCG/FPS.(dungeon crawler???) Picking up cards adds them to your deck. Extra cards are in a random drawpile and used cards are in the discard pile. By pressing R you can “reload” your deck by shuffling in the cards from the discard pile. Weapons are reloadable while health is consumed.

Controls: (Can be changed in the menu)

  • WASD: Movement
  • Space: Jump
  • Mouse: Look
  • Left Click: Use Card
  • R: Reload
  • Wheel: Scroll through cards

Credits:

  • Programming: Jellonator
  • Art: AlucarX60
